Legend:
1 = occurrence within the BLM Planning Area
D = documented
S = suspected
H = historic (not currently known to occur within the District)
V = vagrant (occurs irregularly in District - nonresident, accidental)
U = unknown (known to occur outside Eugene District)
Federal Status:
FC1 = Federal Candidate 1
FC2 = Federal Candidate 2
FE = Federal Endangered
FT = Federal Threatened
PE = Proposed Federal Endangered
BLM Status:
BS or BSO = Bureau Sensitive in Oregon
BA or BAO = Bureau Assessment in Oregon
BT or BTO = Bureau Tracking in Oregon
